item.title: No Thanks, Crypto, UPI Already Solved Digital Payments
item.description: Cryptocurrencies are trying to be a solution to a financial problem that does not exist. UPI solved digital payments years ago.

item.title: You Might Need a College Degree for a Programming Job
item.description: Many companies and tech gurus claim you don’t need a college degree for a programming job. But here’s why you might want to get one regardless.
